title: baby2020
author: baby2020
content: As an aspire ALPHA CALLER here are the does ** FIRST GET A JOURNALYou might be wondering what does journal got to do with alpha calling?you want to be good in this field then you need to write things down This is  very important yet undervalued.** What are the things to put down on your journal ?1. The Tokens  you are researching on .2. How well the token did. if it didn't go well then what was the cause3. How and where did you find the token 4. What was your convictions that this project can do well If you can be consistent with this, believe me you will be able to track your growth To becoming a good alpha you need to know what to look out for in a project Let's say;1. Tokenomics2. The Team3. The Community4. Usecases 5. Upcoming Events6. Roadmap7. Partnerships. etc...As an alpha caller you need to be updated with current trends and NarrativesALSO  HAVE A LIST OF ANALYTICAL TOOLS ACCOUNTSThis is very useful, it helps you get to see early projects Not every blockchain has their own analytical pages  ** Get an accountabilty partner, someone you can share your calls with  This is what i call the JAAR strategy ** Consistency; This is  very key, you want to be good, be consistent** Learn to Document your calls HAVE A BEAUTIFUL READ Contributions to this will be appreciated.
